discrepancies.what: Expected foreign keys to auth.users are not present in live schema.
discrepancies.why: User mapping may be inconsistent and auth cleanup may not cascade.
discrepancies.recommendation: Add or restore foreign keys referencing auth.users if intended.

discrepancies.what: Context expectations do not match live schema tables.
discrepancies.why: Subsequent agents may rely on stale schema snapshots.
discrepancies.recommendation: Update context logs to reflect current live schema.
